The last time we had a vacation, my husband and I went camping.
I haven't been camping in ages.
We stayed near an area that is a ski resort in winter, but we were there in the summer.
There was a quaint little town in the valley at the base of the ski slopes.
It was a little touristy, but very picturesque.
Did you rent a cabin there?
No, we camped in a tent.
We spent most of our time hiking in the mountains,...
...but on several evenings we went into town to look around and do some shopping.
